title: Academy CEO Bill Kramer Highlights Internationalization Efforts While Speaking at Rio Film Fest, Says ‘I’m Still Here’ Furore ‘Increased’ the Academy’s ‘Prestige’
summary: Bill Kramer, CEO of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences, traveled to Brazil for the first time to speak at the Rio de Janeiro International Film Festival alongside Meredith Shea, the Academy’s chief membership, impact and industry officer. The masterclass event marked the exec’s first o…
